0: I was really pleased by how nice the Crowne Plaza is for the price
I thought it was decent value for the hotwire rate
Super great for a super great price
We used Hotelscom and paid before we arrived
Courteous and helpful staff clean place and reasonably priced

Not a lot to talk about here nice clean rooms somewhat comfy beds nice people only stayed one night for business but I would go back again especially for the price 108 per night which was a good price for the area
So I got more and paid more than I wanted
1: Nothing wrong with the food but I felt it was a bit over priced
Overall I would stay there again because of the location and price but it definitely has some issues
it is only fair that we booked it online and should recieve what we have paid for
When checking in they tell me i have to have a deposit of 100 dollars They would nt take cash just credit
When checkout time came I was charged for my son in laws tab which he had already paid
I do not feel like it was worth as much as I paid for it
It was not as clean as I would have expected for the price
Construction going on too expensive for crappy acomodations
The hotel did compensate us with a free breakfast which was very good for a hotel breakfast but not for the price it would have been had we paid
I did not like that their ads say complimentary breakfast because it is nt complimentary if you have to pay extra for it
